// Max Salary
SELECT MAX(salary) from EMPLOYEE;

// print first 3 highest salary
SELECT salary from EMPLOYEE order by salary desc limit 3;

// You have a table named 'orders' with columns 'order_id', 'customer_id', 'order_date', and 'total_amount'. How would you write a query to find the total revenue generated by each customer?
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id;
